text:
Spot hero requires a coding challenge. It's not a small one either; it's like 2+ days of work. I said I had a ton of open source stuff on Github, some doing more complex stuff than their assignment and if they could just look at that.

They refused.

I no longer do pro-interview requirements for free. Maybe if I got a $300 gift card.

Please don't interview here. Don't work for free!!
